title: From consultation to confirmation — the whole process under control
subtitle: The full exchange cycle under the guidance of professionals.
footnote: We don’t just execute the exchange — we guide you at every step, ensuring full safety and transparency.

steps.title: Request
steps.desc: Start in one click — message us via messenger or email, specifying the direction and amount.

steps.title: Confirmation
steps.desc: We get back to the client to confirm the exchange terms and deal parameters.

steps.title: Verification (KYC)
steps.desc: If required, a short client verification (KYC) and document alignment are performed.

steps.title: Office visit
steps.desc: The deal takes place at the scheduled time, privately, with all paperwork prepared.

steps.title: Exchange
steps.desc: The client receives the funds in the preferred format cryptocurrency, cash, or bank transfer.

steps.title: Payout
steps.desc: After confirmation, funds are transferred in the agreed form.
